title: A new mechanism for visible light photocatalysis: Generation of intraband by adsorbed organic compounds with wide-bandgap semiconductors
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00151F, Paper
Teng Wang, Jiachun Cao, Juan Li, Juntian Li, Didi Li, Shaobin Wang, Zhimin Ao
Wide-bandgap semiconductors are generally effective for photocatalytic degradation of VOCs under UV light irradiation. However, we found that various VOCs could be effectively degraded and even mineralized by a variety...
